text: Tuga mben Zon phorga rui gumgi gum Fherasiŋ phorga rui gumgi, mbe Fhe Bakɨme phorgav suan zav mba thamthagi raa ma. Zisas phorga rui gumgi mba raar pav kim, gumgi mbari Zisas han zav kha nzambaran ana muuŋgi: “Ram muuŋgi tɨv khare? Zon phorga rui gumgi gum Fherasiŋ phorga rui gumgi, mbe ntige Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨv suan zav mba thamthagi. Na ndu phorga rui gumgi, mbe Fhe Bakɨme phorga suan zav mba thamthagi fhu.”
